tech_news.description: A new CFI-ZCT2W version of the PS5 DualSense controller could nearly double the original’s battery life, according to one modder’s testing.

tech_news.title: "Has caused extreme damage to our brand and our company reputation" - Running with Scissors cancels Postal: Bullet Paradise over AI-generated assets... two days after reveal - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: After receiving pushback for its flagrant use of generative AI, Postal: Bullet Paradise has been cancelled… just two days after being revealed.

tech_news.title: This tiny magnetic e-reader sticks to the back of your iPhone - The Verge
tech_news.description: Xteink’s X4 is a tiny e-reader with a 4.3-inch E Ink screen you can easily pocket or keep stuck to the back of another device.
